house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1974 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Kitchen Island,Pantry, Storage Space
